EnumCategory.Description: Represents types of events, which can occur with entities in Metanga.

EnumItem.Description: Create event, occurs when an entity is created.
EnumItem.Name: Create

EnumItem.Description: Update event, occurs when an entity is updated.
EnumItem.Name: Update

EnumItem.Description: Delete event, occurs when an entity is deleted.
EnumItem.Name: Delete

EnumCategory.Name: EventType
